toolDescription: Throw a concoction of curses at foes.
Loud roar that repels nearby foes and objects.
Enhances weapon damage with arcane for a short time.
Summons wrathful spirits that lock onto a target.
The art of Quickening; speeds up rolls and quicksteps.
Unleashes blue lightning strikes in front of the caster.
Heals/removes various status inflictions in area of effect.
Fires multiple tentacles from hand; knocks back a foe. Can stagger enemies from behind or when timed as a parry.
Summons a giant and very hungry snake.
Summons a small nova with multiple arcane projectiles.
